author: brane
msg: Clearing the field for issue #872. Clean up the svn_utf API.
It was only used internally in utf.c.
(svn_utf_cstring_to_utf8_ex) New. Use where 'xlator' wasn't NULL in calls
(convert_cstring): New. Common implementation for string converters.

author: philip
msg: The auth code must allow for svn_config__user_config_path to return
a NULL path as it is explicitly documented that this may occur (and
(auth_file_path): Return the path as a parameter and use the return
value for errors, thus avoiding any possible error leak.
(save_creds): Don't leak errors, remove unsed variable.
